item.title: Closures in Ruby
item.description: I found a script that explains everything really well. Credit goes to: # CLOSURES IN RUBY Paul Cantrell http://innig.net # Email: username "cantrell", domain name "pobox.com" Along with this blog entry, it's made the whole deal much easier to figure out. Now.. Why didn't I get that when I was looking at LISP?
